about_the_game:
"Pathfinder RPG - Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Night of the Gray Death


Bring horror and conspiracy to life on your tabletop with these full-color maps featuring key encounter locations from the Pathfinder Second Edition adventure 
Night of the Gray Death  ! One map depicts a crumbled vault and the other map shows a ballroom suitable an eerie masquerade, with alcoves and nooks for scheming or skullduggery! Don't waste your time sketching when you could be playing. With Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Night of the Gray Death, adventure and intrigue await!

NOTE:  This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
